module.name: alias_identification
module.purpose: The Alias identification application module supports the requirement to establish alternate identifications for elements of product data.

inscope.li: the identification of alternate identifiers for information other than product instance identification;
the identification of a required context for the alternate identifier.
the assignment of these identifiers to information.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of alternate identifiers for product data.

uof.name: Alias_Identification
uof.description: The Alias_Identification UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of applying alias identifiers to product data.

description.p: This clause describes usages of this module. This module shall be used in the context of another module (e.g. Identification assignment) to be used.
